SEARCH
Package com.rikuthin.graphics.animations

Class AnimationInstance

java.lang.Object
com.rikuthin.graphics.animations.AnimationInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Updateable
public class AnimationInstance extends Object implements Updateable
Represents an individual animation instance for an entity. Each instance has its own playback state while sharing the same AnimationTemplate.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AnimationInstance(AnimationTemplate template)
    Constructs an AnimationInstance based on a shared AnimationTemplate.

      Returns:

      Returns:
      the current frame's index.

    • getElapsedFrameTime

      public long getElapsedFrameTime()
      Retrieves the time elapsed since the current frame was first displayed.
      Returns:
      The elapsed display time of the current frame.

    • getLastUpdateTime

      public boolean getLastUpdateTime()
      Retrieves the last recorded time the update() method was called (in milliseconds).
      Returns:
      The last recorded update time.
